Package it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Logic.States.Implementations

Class DrawInitialCards

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Logic.States.GameState
it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Logic.States.SynchronousGameState
it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Logic.States.Implementations.DrawInitialCards
public class DrawInitialCards extends SynchronousGameState
Represents the game state where players draw initial cards during the setup phase. This state extends SynchronousGameState and manages the process of drawing golden and resource cards for each player in a synchronous turn-based manner.

  • Method Details

    • drawCard

      public void drawCard(Player player, CardPoolTypes cardPoolType, int index) throws NotYourTurnException, InvalidActionForPlayerStateException, MaxGoldenCardsDrawnException, MaxResourceCardsDrawnException
      Handles a player's attempt to draw a card during the setup phase.
      Overrides:
      drawCard in class GameState
      Parameters:
      player - The player attempting to draw the card.
      cardPoolType - The type of card pool from which the card will be drawn (golden or resource).
      index - The index of the card in the card pool.
      Throws:
      NotYourTurnException - If the player attempts to draw out of turn.
      InvalidActionForPlayerStateException - If the player attempts an invalid action in their current state.
      MaxGoldenCardsDrawnException - If the player tries to draw more golden cards than allowed.
      MaxResourceCardsDrawnException - If the player tries to draw more resource cards than allowed.

      Parameters:

    • nextState

      protected void nextState()
      Switches the game state to the next state.
      Check for the boolean LastRoundFlag. If true then the next state will be the FinalRound, otherwise the next state will be another MainLoop.
      Specified by:
      nextState in class GameState
